Key Match Events: Aaron Jones hit 10 sixes in his unbeaten 94 off 40 balls, the second-most in a T20 World Cup innings
Pre-Game Insights: Aaron Jones described USA's style of cricket as 'fearless, positive, and smart'
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Jones and Andries Gous led USA to their fifth successive win over Canada
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the first T20 World Cup match for both USA and Canada
Others: Canada's Navneet Dhaliwal scored the first half-century for Canada in a T20 World Cup
